text: The number of riders per nation participated in the 1987 Tour de France: {| | | | | |} The 1987 Tour de France was the 74th edition of Tour de France, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Tour began in West Berlin on 1 July and finished on the Champs-Élysées in Paris on 26 July. 23 teams started the Tour, with nine cyclists each. ==Teams== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Cyclists== ===By starting number=== {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend !
